abstract: Detroit Tigers player David Price agrees to $19.75 million contract; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: David Price, the 2012 American League Cy Young Award winner, and the Tigers avoided arbitration when Price agreed to a $19.75 million contract.
snippet: David Price, the 2012 American League Cy Young Award winner, and the Tigers avoided arbitration when Price agreed to a $19.75 million contract.

headline.main: Tigers Give David Price a Record Deal
headline.print_headline: Tigers Give Price a Record Deal
